channel.title: Duel Arena
channel.description: Im at a total loss on how to code the duel arena if someone could link me to a tut or just help me then i would be very grateful

item.title: Duel Arena
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Well, first you need to get the packets, interfaces, ect. Then you need to implement the methods that put your items into the screen, I think they’re similar to Trading. Then you’ll need to program the Rules. Once you’ve done that, you’ll need to initiate the duel. The random teleport selection for which arena is used is simple. Alot of people probably put the “3…2…1… FIGHT!” stage into a Process, which is incorrect. You should trigger and end it with an Event. You should use the “Search” feature to look for a tutorial on this. If there isn’t one, I might consider making one.

Read full topic
